privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Crawltomedia ("we," "our," or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our app.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.text: We collect the following types of information:

content.accountInformation: When you sign up, we collect your email address, username, and any other information you provide during registration.
content.oauthTokens: When you connect your social media accounts, we collect OAuth tokens to enable secure posting and access to account statistics. These tokens are encrypted and stored securely.
content.usageData: We may collect information about how you interact with our app, such as pages visited, features used, and errors encountered.
content.deviceInformation: We may collect information about the device you use to access Crawltomedia, including your IP address, browser type, and operating system.
content.cookies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and analyze usage. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us: Keep you logged in to your account, remember your preferences and settings, and analyze traffic and usage patterns to improve our services.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInformation.text: We use the information we collect to:

content.1: Authenticate your account and provide access to our app.
content.2: Enable posting to your connected social media accounts.
content.3: Retrieve and display statistics about your social media accounts.
content.4: Improve our app's functionality and user experience.
content.5: Communicate with you about updates, offers, or changes to our services.

sharingYourInformation.title: Sharing Your Information
sharingYourInformation.text: We do not sell or rent your information to third parties. We may share your information in the following cases:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers:
serviceProviders.text: We work with third-party providers to facilitate our services (e.g., hosting, analytics).

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance:
legalCompliance.text: We may disclose information if required to do so by law or in response to valid legal requests.

protectionOfRights.title: Protection of Rights:
protectionOfRights.text: We may share information to protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, or that of our users or others.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take the security of your data seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time by contacting us.

content.1: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
content.2: Withdraw your consent for data collection and processing.
content.3: File a complaint with a data protection authority if you believe your rights have been violated.

1.title: Accept All Cookies:
1.text: Allow full functionality and improved user experience.

3.title: Disable Cookies:
3.text: Opt out of non-essential cookies by changing your browser settings. Note that this may impact the functionality of the app.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Crawltomedia integrates with third-party platforms such as YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok. These platforms have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.

policyChanges.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. We encourage you to review this page periodically for updates.
